attributes.action: create cheap equity release scheme to help both pensions  and housing crises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please consider creating a cheap equity release scheme to help ease the pensions crisis; the government could then use the housing acquired on death of the recipients for affordable hosuing. Nice double whammy. I do not understand why Clive Soley and Andrew Slaughter almost completely ignored the idea - as my previous and current MP.  Why woudnt it work - is it politically impossible ??

bruce stevenson
